item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

11/5/2012's location will be:

Playwright Irish Pub

http://www.playwrightirishpub.com/ordereze/1000/Page.aspx

Specials:

$4 mixed drinks & wines (check before ordering)
$3 draft beer
$2.50 can beer

Parking...always free!  If the lot fills, there is also street parking, as well as a municipal lot on Whitney Ave next to the Whitneyville Grocery.

P.S. We're still short on funds for Meetup dues.  If you've been to our happy hours before, and haven't donated anything recently, please donate a dollar or 5 or whatever towards dues.

HOST: Jason (cell # in RSVP)

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

Hope to see you all there.


Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever (except hurricanes)

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host, and we're most likely the largest group at the bar on a Monday
item.name: Mon. 11/5 - Monday Happy Hour: Playwright Irish Pub in Hamden
